message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay $75 for it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $85.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob! However, I'm still looking to make a small profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82.
Alice, thank you for considering my previous offers. I would like to propose one final offer of $80 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
